Package com.threadteam.thread.activities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddPostActivity
    This activity class handles the addition and creation of post.
    AddServerActivity
    This activity class handles the addition and creation of servers.
    ChatActivity
    This activity class handles displaying and interacting with the server's main chat.
    EditProfileActivity
    This activity class handles the edit of profile.
    LoginActivity
    This activity class handles the logging in and resetting password of user.
    MemberProfileActivity
    This activity class displays the profile of a server member.
    PostsActivity
    This activity class handles displaying the server's posts.
    RegisterActivity
    This activity class handles the registering of users.
    ServerSettingsActivity
    This activity class handles the settings for a server.
    SetNotificationsActivity
    This activity class handles the notification settings of user.
    SettingsActivity
    This activity class handles the notification settings of user.
    ViewMembersActivity
    This activity class displays all the members in the current server.
    ViewPostDetailsActivity
    This activity class handles the viewing of a post and commenting on the post
    ViewProfileActivity
    This activity class handles the viewing of a post and commenting on the post
    ViewServersActivity
    This activity class displays all the servers that the current user is in.
